mapper.insert: insert into lf_reply(rno, fno, reply, replyer, replydate) values(reply_seq.nextval, #{fno}, #{reply}, #{replyer}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select r.fno, r.replyer, r.rno, r.reply, r.replydate, m.mid from lf_reply r inner join lf_member m on r.replyer = m.mid where fno = #{fno}
mapper.delete: delete lf_reply where rno = #{rno} and replyer = #{replyer}
mapper.select: select replyer from lf_reply where rno=#{rno}
mapper.update: update lf_reply set reply=#{reply} where rno=#{rno} and replyer=#{replyer}
